name: McConnells Group
description: McConnells is a marketing agency that believes that a single approach can achieve goals. Their solution? To deliver what works. With specialists in both B2B and B2C at your disposal, they can target the right audience  and get a response. They take extensive and proven knowledge and combine it with clear, creative thinking to give you a different service. You’ll always have the reassurance that McConnells’ opinions are based on marketing experience.
